data.title: Directory of Chitrapur Saraswat Musicians and Dancers
data.meta_description: Directory of Chitrapur Saraswat Musicians and Dancers - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides information about the Kanara Saraswat Association and its efforts to promote Hindustani classical music and dance through various Sangeet Sammelans over the years. It highlights that Chitrapur Saraswats have produced many renowned musicians and dancers. It also introduces the coordinators of the music directory project and their motivation to document artists from the community, both famous and lesser known.
